newsitem.title: MEXICO: Interacciones starts Penoles as hold.
newsitem.headline: Interacciones starts Penoles as hold.

text.p: Mexico's Interacciones brokerage said on Friday that it had initiated coverage of Mexican mining giant Industrias Penoles, the wolrd's largest refined silver producer, with a hold recommendation.

"We believe that increased gold exposure and indeed, higher exposure to precious metals overall (55-60 percent of sales by 1999), plans to diversfy geographically and a positive metals price outlook should result in a higher valuation over the long term (1998 and beyond).

"However, in the short to medium term, Penoles is essentially a quality defensive stock and is not a play on the domestic recovery. We initiative coverage with a hold recommendation," the brokerage said in a report.

Interacciones said Penoles plans to increase silver sales volumes by 2.5 percent this year and seven percent in 1997. Gold sales volumes will remain flat this year, but will grow by 27 percent in 1997 and a further 26 percent in 1998.
Zinc refining capacity is being expanded by 33 percent and zinc volumes will increase 7.6 percent this year and 26 percent by year end 1998, Interacciones said.
